Sensitive Training

Psychic Awareness and Mind Reading

Advanced Mental Uncommon Investigation

Overview

Sensitive training is one of the most sought-after magical disciplines, granting practitioners the ability to read minds, sense emotions, and perceive psychic impressions. Sensitives are invaluable in investigations, negotiations, and understanding the true intentions of others.

The discipline requires exceptional mental control and emotional stability. Unlike other magical practices that manipulate external forces, sensitive training turns the practitioner's awareness inward and outward simultaneously, developing an enhanced perception of consciousness itself.

Core Abilities

  • Reading surface thoughts and emotions
  • Detecting lies and deception
  • Sensing psychic impressions from objects
  • Perceiving the presence of other minds
  • Limited precognitive abilities
  • Emotional empathy and influence

Mental Requirements

Sensitive training demands specific mental characteristics:

  • Emotional Control: Managing overwhelming psychic input
  • Mental Discipline: Maintaining focus despite distractions
  • Empathic Resilience: Dealing with others' emotions
  • Ethical Foundation: Responsible use of mind-reading abilities
  • Concentration: Sustained mental effort for extended periods

Training Stats

Difficulty:
Time to Master: 8-15 years
Success Rate: 15%
Practitioners: Very Few

Notable Sensitives

Cassandra Pharos Oracle/Prophet
Finbar Wrong Psychic Detective
Geoffrey Scrutinous Mind Reader

Related Disciplines

Energy Throwing Teleportation Symbol Magic Necromancy

Training Progression

1

Mental Awareness

Duration: 1-2 years

Learning to quiet the mind and become aware of your own thoughts and emotions as separate entities. Students practice meditation and mental exercises.

  • Basic meditation techniques
  • Thought observation exercises
  • Emotional awareness training
  • Mental shielding basics
2

Empathic Development

Duration: 2-3 years

Developing sensitivity to others' emotions and learning to distinguish between your feelings and those of others around you.

  • Emotion recognition training
  • Empathic boundary setting
  • Group meditation exercises
  • Emotional filtering techniques
3

Surface Thought Reading

Duration: 3-4 years

Learning to perceive surface thoughts and immediate mental activity of others. This stage requires careful ethical training.

  • Thought perception exercises
  • Selective mental tuning
  • Ethical guidelines study
  • Consent-based practice
4

Deep Mind Reading

Duration: 4-6 years

Advanced practitioners learn to access deeper thoughts, memories, and subconscious material. Extremely mentally demanding.

  • Memory access techniques
  • Subconscious exploration
  • Mental defense penetration
  • Psychic archaeology
5

Precognitive Abilities

Duration: Ongoing

Master-level sensitives may develop limited precognitive abilities, sensing future events or probabilities through psychic impressions.

  • Future probability sensing
  • Prophetic vision interpretation
  • Timeline perception
  • Destiny thread reading

Sensitive Abilities

Mind Reading

Level: Intermediate to Advanced

The core sensitive ability - reading the thoughts and mental activity of other individuals. Requires careful control to avoid overwhelming mental input.

Applications:

  • Criminal interrogation
  • Lie detection
  • Information gathering
  • Understanding motivations

Emotion Sensing

Level: Beginner to Advanced

Perceiving and understanding the emotional states of others. Often the first ability sensitives develop during training.

Applications:

  • Emotional counseling
  • Conflict resolution
  • Social navigation
  • Threat assessment

Psychometry

Level: Advanced

Reading psychic impressions left on objects by their previous owners or significant events. Valuable for investigations.

Applications:

  • Crime scene analysis
  • Historical research
  • Object authentication
  • Missing person cases

Lie Detection

Level: Intermediate

Sensing deception through mental and emotional indicators. One of the most practically useful sensitive abilities.

Applications:

  • Legal proceedings
  • Business negotiations
  • Personal relationships
  • Security screening

Precognition

Level: Master

Limited ability to perceive future events or probabilities. Extremely rare and often unreliable without proper training.

Applications:

  • Disaster prevention
  • Strategic planning
  • Personal guidance
  • Threat prediction

Mental Shielding

Level: Essential

Protecting one's own mind from psychic intrusion and overwhelming mental input. Critical for sensitive survival.

Applications:

  • Privacy protection
  • Mental stability
  • Psychic defense
  • Crowd management

Challenges and Risks

Mental Strain

Constant exposure to others' thoughts and emotions can be overwhelming. Sensitives must learn to filter and shield their minds to maintain sanity.

  • Information overload
  • Emotional burnout
  • Mental fatigue
  • Concentration difficulties

Ethical Dilemmas

The ability to read minds raises serious ethical questions about privacy, consent, and the responsible use of psychic abilities.

  • Privacy invasion concerns
  • Consent requirements
  • Information misuse potential
  • Relationship complications

Social Isolation

Many sensitives struggle with relationships, as constant awareness of others' thoughts can make normal social interaction difficult.

  • Difficulty trusting others
  • Overwhelming honesty
  • Fear of mind reading
  • Emotional boundaries

Psychic Attacks

Sensitives are vulnerable to mental attacks from hostile psychics or magical entities that can cause serious psychological damage.

  • Mental intrusion
  • Psychic overwhelming
  • False memory implantation
  • Consciousness fragmentation

Essential Training Techniques

Meditation Practices

Foundation of all sensitive training. Students learn various meditation techniques to achieve mental clarity and control.

  • Mindfulness meditation
  • Concentration exercises
  • Breathing techniques
  • Visualization practices

Mental Shielding

Critical defensive techniques that protect sensitives from psychic overload and mental attacks.

  • Barrier visualization
  • Selective filtering
  • Emergency shutdown
  • Psychic camouflage

Empathic Exercises

Controlled practice with emotional perception and management in safe, supervised environments.

  • Emotion identification
  • Empathic boundaries
  • Emotional mirroring
  • Group dynamics

Ethical Training

Essential education on the responsible use of psychic abilities and respect for others' mental privacy.

  • Consent protocols
  • Privacy respect
  • Information handling
  • Professional boundaries
